# Get Basic team data

```{r}
teamCode <- "mavericks"
teams_list %>% filter(TEAM_CODE == teamCode) %>% mutate_if(is.factor, as.character) -> basicTeamInfo; basicTeamInfo

```

# Get season Stats
```{r}
url <- urlBuilder(statCat = "teamdashboardbygeneralsplits", TeamID = basicTeamInfo %>% select(TEAM_ID), m)
fromJson_workaround()
```
